mapper.insert: insert into stayhotel (scheduleNum, stayHotelDate, placeNum) values (#{scheduleNum}, #{stayHotelDate}, #{placeNum})
mapper.select: select s.*, p.placeName, p.placeImage, p.placeLat, p.placeLong from stayhotel s join place p on s.placeNum = p.placeNum where s.scheduleNum = #{scheduleNum}
